name: Cersei Lannister
text: Youre Cersei lannister, you may be sligtly incestious but you have an inspiring appetite for power.

name: John Snow
text: AHHH another potentially incestious character... you are soft at heart but that thing you do with your tongue john snow...

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Your traits show you have a thing for Dragons, conquering with class and maybe your nephew?

name: Samwell Tarly
text: Samwell has a heart of gold, he has your best interest at heart and will do anything to prove his worth as a grandmaester

name: Hodor
text: Hodor... A man of few words. you should hodor more...
